result.execSummary:
The defendant Klydgia J. Norton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
With huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before 12/25/2015.
Consecutive to: any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Klydgia J. Norton

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Klydgia J. Norton in court with attorney Brent W. Varner.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Varner states matter is resolved and states recs.  State is in agreement.  Atty Varner enters NC plea.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Atty Varner makes statement on behalf of DE.  DE makes statement.  Court sentences.

Ct 1:  NC
20 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 12/25/2015 at 6:00 pm
2 days credit to be applied
$543.00 costs/surcharges to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
Cash bond applied
Attorney Brent W. Varner in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial Br. 1. Bond continues.

Pre-trial conference on March 20, 2015 at 10:15 am.
Return date on March 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Brent W. Varner in court.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Reset for PTC and RD.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 20, 2015 at 10:15 am.  Return date scheduled for March 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
victim's petition to modify bond....court recv'd no objection removes the condtion of no contact

Pre-trial conference on February 13, 2015 at 10:45 am.
Return date on February 24, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Klydgia J. Norton in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney.  Defendant is not employed.  State request to be heard on bond.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Defendant makes statement.  $500.00 cash bond continues however, amended to add special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with M.M.  Absolute sobriety.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 13, 2015 at 10:45 am.  Return date scheduled for February 24, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
